doc:
John P. McCarthy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_P._McCarthy 0 John P. McCarthy (March 17, 1884 – September 4, 1962), also known as J.P. McCarthy or simply as John McCarthy, was an American director and screenwriter of the 1920s through 1945. He began in the film industry in front of the camera, as an actor in silent films and film shorts during the 1910s, before moving behind the camera in 1920. He would usually direct his own screenplays. Although he directed the occasional drama or comedy, his specialty was the Western, which make up most of his filmography. John_P._McCarthy ( March_17_,_1884 – September_4_,_1962 ) , also_known as J.P._McCarthy or simply as John_McCarthy , was an_American_director_and_screenwriter of the_1920s through 1945 . He began in the_film_industry in front of the_camera , as an_actor in silent_films_and_film_shorts during the_1910s , before moving behind the_camera in 1920 . He would_usually_direct his_own_screenplays . Although he directed the_occasional_drama_or_comedy , his_specialty was the_Western , which make up most of his_filmography .
